original_title: 紅顔の若武者 織田信長
overview: A dynamic story depicting the rise to power of Oda Nobunaga. The story of a young man on the battlefields of the Sengoku era, who possessed character and courage, and who became a great commander and ruler, while some called him a great dictator. A film adaptation of the novel by Sohachi Yamaoka.
title: Young Ruddy Warrior: Nobunaga Oda
